Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 43rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound #43 buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Laramie

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Jackson
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Jackson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Jackson due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
